Email_1.Subject: Unbelievable
Email_1.Body:
If you had done your job 21 people would
	still be alive today.  I hope you keep that in
	mind going forward and don't make a mistake
	like that again.
	
	Your next assignment is available, but I'm
	warning you.  You're on thin ice.

Email_2.Subject: Don't Beat Yourself Up
Email_2.Body:
Hey, you are probably going through a rough
    time right now, but don't beat yourself up 
    over it. It is his fault, not your fault, that
    those people died; he is the one that killed
    those people, we just tried to prevent it.
